channel.title: 1 step away from finish ! PLEASE HELP -_-
channel.description:
Okay so im following a tutorial and it tells me to Edit and delete everything in the "runserver.bat" file with this code. --------------------------------------------------------------- @echo off COLOR 08 title **PUT YOUR CLIENT NAME HERE** Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause ----------------------------------------------------------------
But i dont know what to put the client as.
I have Moparscape30 as my client and im using CheezScape as the Source, and for others to connect i am using the No-Ip method.
Could someone please tell me how to set the Client up so that i can get this server up and running =\
Thx
Paul

Thx alot

item.title: 1 step away from finish ! PLEASE HELP -_-
item.dc:creator: @imickhunt imickhunt
item.description:
@imickhunt wrote:

Okay so im following a tutorial and it tells me to Edit and delete everything in the “runserver.bat” file with this code.

@echo off
COLOR 08
title PUT YOUR CLIENT NAME HERE Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe” server
pause

But i dont know what to put the client as.

I have Moparscape30 as my client and im using CheezScape as the Source, and for others to connect i am using the No-Ip method.

Could someone please tell me how to set the Client up so that i can get this server up and running =\

Thx

Paul
